programme.desc: Jelajahi kekayaan masakan yang menampilkan rasa autentik. Sertai kami dalam pengembaraan rasa di seluruh Indonesia, hanya di Makan Terooos, di mana setiap hidangan memiliki kisahnya sendiri.

programme.desc: Indri bercita-cita untuk menjuarai perlumbaan kasut roda. Namun, dia tidak menyangka akan terjebak dalam membantu Jojo, seorang penternak ikan keli, untuk mendapatkan cinta sejatinya selepas Jojo mengalami trauma akibat putus cinta.

Namun, di puncak kebahagiaan perkahwinan mereka, Rafael tiba-tiba muncul kembali.

programme.title: Makan Terooos Ep29
programme.desc: Jelajahi kekayaan masakan yang menampilkan rasa autentik. Sertai kami dalam pengembaraan rasa di seluruh Indonesia, hanya di Makan Terooos, di mana setiap hidangan memiliki kisahnya sendiri.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep237
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Habis Gelap Terbitlah Yang Menyala
programme.desc: Indri, seorang wanita berdikari, mencari rezeki sebagai penjual jamu keliling dengan menunggang basikal tuanya setiap hari. Suatu hari, ketika sedang berniaga, dia tanpa sengaja melanggar Pras yang sedang tergesa-gesa menuju ke sebuah mesyuarat penting. Takdir menemukan mereka sekali lagi, tetapi kali ini Indri naik angin kerana dia mendapati Pras berdiri di hadapan rumahnya sambil menggeledah jemuran pakaiannya.

programme.title: Mega Series Suara Hati Istri: Anjani Ep30
programme.desc: Anjani berkahwin dengan Ammar melalui perkahwinan yang diatur, namun malangnya Ammar tidak mencintai Anjani, terutamanya selepas mengetahui bahawa Anjani sukar untuk hamil. Akhirnya, Anjani mengambil anak angkat yang ternyata mempunyai rahsia masa lalu dalam kehidupan suaminya.

programme.title: Travel through Jiangsu Season 3 Ep1
programme.desc: Travel around the scenic spots and historic sites and the streets and alleys of the whole province of Jiangsu, look for historians, scholars, folk artisans, etc., explore a glimpse of what traditional Chinese culture and discover the unique charm of Jiangsu.

programme.title: Love Never Comes Late Season 4 Ep1
programme.desc: A dating program for singles and divorced individuals over marriage age. Each episode features four male and three female guests who engage in one-on-one conversations. They will be arranged in a room to foster deeper connections. Love never comes late!

programme.title: Love Behind the Mask Ep1
programme.desc: The story follows Wen Yanshu and Mu Han, who meet and fall in love while hiding their actual identities. They protect their homes and strive for a better world together, finding comfort in each others past wounds and bravely facing their responsibilities and missions.

programme.title: Perfect Match (2011) Ep22
programme.desc: A blind date program which adapts to the modern life's pace to provide a platform for single boys and girls to find the person who they liked. There're 24 single girls in this program, they can understand the single man by those three processes, which are "the first impression", "the second judgement", "the final decision". Meanwhile, they'll decide if the single man can get the right to enter the final prograss-Men's Rights by make their lights on or off. If the man get the rights, he can take the girl whose light on with him together or try to choose his favorite girls for the last time.

In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4911
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2007
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3478
programme.desc: <Stylish Man - The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man - The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep3137
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep28
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep58
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan. 5

programme.title: Way to Health (M) Ep355
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Way to Health (M) Ep356
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Top Singers (T) Ep663
programme.desc: The show 'Top Singers' aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep1030
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Dear Mom (M) Ep62
programme.desc: Feng-Yi Li handles everything in the house while her husband, Shu-An, lounges and daydreams. She constantly worries about the love lives of their four daughters. Yi-Wan starts a relationship with a gang leaders son despite claiming to have never dated. Qing-Qing may be having an affair with a married man. Xiao-Xi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of "the others." An-Qing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When Feng-Yi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize they've neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

programme.title: Dear Mom (M) Ep63
programme.desc: Feng-Yi Li handles everything in the house while her husband, Shu-An, lounges and daydreams. She constantly worries about the love lives of their four daughters. programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep99
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in! PK

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep1030
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep1031
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep768
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom. <>

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep542
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Gung Hay Fat Choy (M) Ep58
programme.desc: In a bad economy, many people dream of becoming rich overnight, especially the Jiang family. Mother Jiang pushes her three children to earn money so that they can one day live in luxury. Even her daughter-in-law wishes for the same thing. She hopes that one day she can visit her parents with the money that spills out of her purse.

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earths surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: Hail the Judge
programme.desc: A low level magistrate is run out of town for defending a beautiful murder suspect. Through a series of comedic events he ascends to the top rank & returns looking for revenge.

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: Young Chan Lok Kwun accidentally stumbles into the Kowloon Walled City while fleeing, subsequently finding purpose amid chaos and gaining wisdom. Bonding with Shin, Twelfth Master and AV, they unite under Tornado's leadership to defend against the villain, Mr Big's assaults, and pledge to protect the safe haven of the Walled City together.

programme.title: I Believe
programme.desc: Chu Chu has been waiting for her first love for 10 years but he marries someone else in the end. As she loses faith in love, she meets a wedding planner and a handsome and rich man, who both help her get over her ex-boyfriend. As Chu Chu feels the same love from them, she must make up her mind. Who will she choose in the end?

programme.title: L Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk and Chief Inspector Lau both hit a dead end when investigating their respective bribery and money laundering cases. When Luk is accused of bribery after being framed by the money launderers, he risks everything he has to find crucial evidence against them to clear his name.

programme.title: Confinement
programme.desc: Si Ling, a pregnant painter, moves into her dream home after winning an award and hires a confinement nanny. As she begins her one-month confinement after giving birth to her daughter, inexplicable incidents start happening in the house, threatening both her and her baby

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the others mole.

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the Gang of Five in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: Death Notice
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves death notices in a city, stating when, how and who he will murder. Even if the victims report it to the police and receive protection, the killer can still break through and execute them. While the police sets up a special task force in response, they expose an even bigger conspiracy behind.

programme.title: Fight Back to School III
programme.desc: The millionaire, Million Wong , is found dead in a hotel room. Officer Sing Sing (Stephen Chow) is called in when a man is murdered with an ice pick during sexual intercourse. By an uncanny coincidence the man looks identical to Sing so the decision is made to send him in as an undercover again for further investigation. In the same day, he finds himself with a beautiful wife (Anita Mui), an incompetent sidekick (Anthony Wong) and one very unhappy girlfriend (Cheung Man). All this and somehow he still has to try and solve the case!

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: Ping reports a case of a rich mans son bribing prison guards to cover up his criminal activities in the prison to the ICAC. ICAC Chief Officer Luk goes undercover in prison to conduct his investigation. Despite the risks involved, Luk is determined to complete his mission with the help of his cell mate, Wang.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Gambler
programme.desc: Manfred and Flora are gambling addicts who have come across each other a few times at the casino, but do not leave impression on each other until they both suffer heavy losses and are held hostage by the loan sharks in Macau. They find themselves falling in love, and decide to get married when they come back to Hong Kong.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Last Suspect
programme.desc: Lawyer Chen receives a mysterious call demanding her to defend a murder suspect after her daughter is kidnapped, and is told that she can only save her daughter by winning the case. As she starts investigation with the police and evidence emerges, Chen discovers the truth and reveals the mastermind. Can she rescue her daughter in time?

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: Trouble Girl
programme.desc: Xiao Xiao suffers from ADHD and faces bullying in school. Her mother sees her as a troublemaker, while her father toils abroad. The only solace comes from her empathetic teacher, Paul. During a typhoon, Xiao Xiao discovers a secret between her mother and Paul, unravelling complex emotions and shared helplessness in life.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his familys expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his familys reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: I Did It My Way
programme.desc: As the secretive, complex world of online drug trafficking increasingly targets Hong Kong, the police launches a risky and top-secret sting operation to bring down one of the most notorious drug lords in Asia.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fte. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servants confusion, threatening the couples union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. Another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Lin finally battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, it's cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Dong and Chu plan to get married but their families who are lifelong rivals, disapproved. They decide to fake suicide and eventually get both of their parents to settle their differences and approve the marriage. Concurrently, a record company announces that they will release Dongs songs, leading to double bliss for the couple.

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: The Yang Generals were ambushed by the enemies and only two of the sons survived. The fifth son of Yangs escapes to Shaolin temple and learns the pole-fighting techniques from the monks, eventually creating his own Eight Diagram Pole Fight and teaming up with the Shaolin monks to avenge his family.

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: A titular gang of misfits come together to protect a patriotic general from a scheming usurper. To this end, the unlikely heroes act as the generals escorts on a dangerous journey to a distant British consulate, beset by enemies and sinister Japanese interference along the way.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: Chivalrous swordsman Fung goes in search of another swordsman on the run, Li Yue, in order to reunite him with his love. Though both men meet and end up being close friends, Li Yue did not reveal his true identity until Fungs life is endangered by a gang looking for revenge...

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Ghosts Galore
programme.desc: Young Taoist priest Lu and his friend are nearly killed by a female ghost during an exorcism. Luckily, Master Lian saves their lives, so they beseech him to teach them his skills. When his friend is killed by ruthless ninjas, Lu decides to learn the ultimate witchcraft and teams up with his master to defeat them.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand worth of silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master Shadow Whip, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to Shadow Whip?

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Changs farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma ends when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huang's wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: As more people are learning martial arts from Shaolin, the Qing court orders for it to be banned and plans to destroy the temple. The Shaolin disciples decide to take their protest to the streets, using Shaolin skills to curb their hatred, but when the Qing troops start attacking Shaolin Temple, the disciples vow to protect it at all costs.

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her fathers towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: Magnificent Wanderers
programme.desc: Lin and his two friends are traveling patriots who vow to stand up against violence and fight for justice. They meet a rich young man Chu by chance one day and the four become best friends. When a foreign prince plots to possess Chus family fortune and goes after him, Lin and friends go all out to help Chu fight against the villain.

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a mans role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Shaolin Rescuers
programme.desc: Hong Xi Guan of Shaolin is chased and wounded by a martial arts scum who took refuge in the Qing court. He is saved and healed by friends from the wet market and they hide Hong in a bean curd shop to protect him. However, Hongs enemy finds him and ambushes him at the shop, hoping to capture Hong and all his friends.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, shes soon framed for her husbands murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense

programme.title: Return of the One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: One-armed Swordsman Fang Kang wants to lead a quiet life with his wife, but when she is abducted by the Eight Demon Swordsmen clan, he is forced to take them on in order to save her.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighter's retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: Battle In Seattle
programme.desc: Seattle broke into a full-scale state of emergency as thousands of protestors gathered in resistance to the World Trade Organization. The lives of the citys mayor, a SWAT cop on the streets and his pregnant wife, and four demonstrators intersect in the ensuing riots.

programme.title: Hancock

programme.title: Hidden Frontiers: Arabia with Reza Pakravan S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Reza uncovers the mystery of human survival in Omanone of the driest places on earth.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S12 Ep15
programme.desc: Rising Waters - Alaskans must rely on family to overcome rising waters as they seek the spring's offerings. The Hailstones must work together to overcome a quickly flooding tundra.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Iceland: Ice - Tour an island built by volcanoes, but sculpted by ice. About 1.5 million years ago, a sheet of ice descended from the north and covered the land. Today, massive glaciers continue to carve marine cliffs and cut down mountains.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Walking with a Pangolin - Crush a busy day with the team as they release rehabbed pythons, teach a pangolin how to hunt, and round up a troop of vervet monkeys. Search for a missing bird of prey with Dr. Charlotte, while Dr. Amanda helps a bushpig savaged by poachers dogs.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Tsiba's New Mum - Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelopes tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Into the Sunset - Contend with a flood of abandoned koala joeys, then join vet nurse Nick on a hunt for natural remedies to treat a wallabys gut ailment. Ponder options for a baby bat stuck in a tree and look on as vet Karina operates on a barn owls fractured wing.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Villains - Meet natures most wanted and see why the baddest of the bad dont get the respect they deserve. Admire the great white sharks electrical sensors, the razor-sharp limbs of the dead leaf mantis, and the zombie-creating powers of cordyceps fungi.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Sidekicks - Unravel strange alliances that ensure mutual success in the wild. Explore the partnership between clownfish and anemones, watch oxpeckers keep savannah residents healthy, and review the quid-pro-poo agreements of dung beetles and pitcher plants.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia S2 Ep6
programme.desc: African Myths - Africa is a continent filled with unique and extraordinary creatures whose lives are shaped by millions of years of evolution. Africa is also the birthplace of humankind. We traveled alongside the continent's animals on our own journey of evolution, yet intelligence took us on a very different path. Our curiosity led to questions about the world around us which were answered through stories, myths and legends.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Echoes of the Past - Learn how Arctic terns negotiate a 50,000-mile-a-year commute to summer in Kerrys Maharee Islands. Go whale-watching off Brandon Head, then witness Irelands greatest wildlife spectacle: a 1,000-strong colony of grey seals on Great Blasket Island.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Jasper, Terry, and Gumbo - Embrace an invasive nutria whos become part of the family, paddle around with Gumbo the goose, and visit a blind hedgehog and his human chum. Explore a swimmers bond with wild gray seals and hang out with Cosima the monkey and Jasper the serval.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Villains - Meet natures most wanted and see why the baddest of the bad dont get the respect they deserve. Admire the great white sharks electrical sensors, the razor-sharp limbs of the dead leaf mantis, and the zombie-creating powers of cordyceps fungi.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Villains - Meet natures most wanted and see why the baddest of the bad dont get the respect they deserve. Admire the great white sharks electrical sensors, the razor-sharp limbs of the dead leaf mantis, and the zombie-creating powers of cordyceps fungi.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Sidekicks - Unravel strange alliances that ensure mutual success in the wild. Explore the partnership between clownfish and anemones, watch oxpeckers keep savannah residents healthy, and review the quid-pro-poo agreements of dung beetles and pitcher plants.

programme.title: Baby Animals S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Lil' Hunters - Life at the upper end of the food chain means hard work and constant learning. Discover how young predators, from lion and cheetah cubs to coyotes and silver fox kits, learn to move stealthily and harness their highly adapted skills.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo S1 Ep2
programme.desc: From Pouch to Foot - Eastern Grey kangaroos are prolific breeders, but bringing up baby is fraught with challenges. Predators, climate extremes, and lively joeys mean kangaroo mothers face a daily struggle to keep their young alive.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast S1 Ep2
programme.desc: March of the Crabs - On the island of Providencia, a black crab begins the mission of her life, escorting 80,000 eggs from her home, on a 3 km hike to the coast. Join her, and millions of her clan, on a journey fraught with danger, where chances of survival are slim.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lemur Spirit - This is the story of a day in the life of an Indris Family following a mother, father, and their three offspring around their home in the rainforest of Mantadia National Park in Madagascar.

programme.title: Monkey Island S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Mother's Tale - The jungle of Sri Lanka is a monkeys paradise. But not everyone here is equal. Anna sits at the bottom of the social ladder. And with a newborn baby, life is getting tougher. As drought grips the region tensions boil over. Anna is a devoted mother. But can she do enough to keep her son alive?

programme.title: Monkey Island S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Leaving Home - An ancient citadel once home to Sri Lankas kings has now been reclaimed by the jungle and theres a new dynasty in power. Monkeys.

programme.title: Monkey Island S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Trouble in Paradise - Tensions rise when drought overtakes an ancient Sri Lankan temple shared by tufted grey langurs, toque macaques, and purple-faced leaf monkeys. Witness the drama as the lower-ranking primates struggle to stay hydrated amid a mutinous plot.

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Australia - Its a UNESCO World Heritage Site, the largest sand island on earth, and home to wild dingoes, six-foot sand-worms, and eucalyptus woodlands. Find out how everything lives happily together in a complex ecosystem built entirely upon sand.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Better Together - The wilds of Zambia are a tough place to live. Here, many animals must come together in groups to help defend territory, protect offspring, find food and overcome predators.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Safari CSI - Everyday in the Luangwa Valley a carcass is sighted. Each body holds the story that lead them to their death. In Safari CSI we investigate what killed three carcasses that have been uncovered...

programme.title: Tales from Zambia S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Africa's Edens - Zambia is home to three very special and different African Edens. The low, hot Luangwa River Valley, the high, dry Liuwa Plain and the cool, wet Kasanka National Park. Defined by the earth on which they sit and shaped by the seasons, each place offers something unique to the wildlife that chooses to live there.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia S2 Ep5
programme.desc: The Valley of the Birds - Zambias Luangwa Valley is home to Africas biggest and most fearsome giants, but what really makes it special are its birds. There are over 400 different species here; each perfectly adapted to exploit every opportunity on offer.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia S2 Ep6
programme.desc: African Myths - Africa is a continent filled with unique and extraordinary creatures whose lives are shaped by millions of years of evolution. Africa is also the birthplace of humankind. We traveled alongside the continent's animals on our own journey of evolution, yet intelligence took us on a very different path. Our curiosity led to questions about the world around us which were answered through stories, myths and legends.

programme.title: Alien Abyss S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Origin Stories - Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.

programme.title: Alien Abyss S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Allies and Adversaries - Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earths oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Earth - Travel to the ends of the Earth, where a drama is unfolding in real time. Meet animals, from tiny butterflies to huge humpback whales, that are acting as sentinels, adapting their behaviour, and helping us unlock the riddles of our changing planet.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Islands - Find out why islands are like mini-Earths where evolution happens before your eyes. Journey from the Galpagos to Antarctica to see how sea lions, finches, crickets, monkeys and other wildlife are finding surprising solutions to climatic problems.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Heat - Go to extremes, from the Sahara to the outback, where animals are teaching us how to survive in our heating world. Shelter in caves with chimps, see camels sip salt water, and listen as zebra finches sing to their eggs to make their chicks smaller.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ice - Trek to the planets quickly melting poles, where animals are giving scientists clues about our future existence. Learn how the movements of polar bears, penguins, and other arctic creatures could help humans map (and prevent) global warming.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Grasslands - Explore one of Earths most vital but overlooked habitats and learn how grasslands could slow climate change by soaking up more carbon than forests do. Meet key species, such as bison and pumas, that could restore this resource and heal our planet.

programme.title: Alien Abyss S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Origin Stories - Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.

programme.title: Alien Abyss S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Allies and Adversaries - Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earths oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Earth - Travel to the ends of the Earth, where a drama is unfolding in real time. Meet animals, from tiny butterflies to huge humpback whales, that are acting as sentinels, adapting their behaviour, and helping us unlock the riddles of our changing planet.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Islands - Find out why islands are like mini-Earths where evolution happens before your eyes. Journey from the Galpagos to Antarctica to see how sea lions, finches, crickets, monkeys and other wildlife are finding surprising solutions to climatic problems.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Heat - Go to extremes, from the Sahara to the outback, where animals are teaching us how to survive in our heating world. Shelter in caves with chimps, see camels sip salt water, and listen as zebra finches sing to their eggs to make their chicks smaller.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ice - Trek to the planets quickly melting poles, where animals are giving scientists clues about our future existence. Learn how the movements of polar bears, penguins, and other arctic creatures could help humans map (and prevent) global warming.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Grasslands - Explore one of Earths most vital but overlooked habitats and learn how grasslands could slow climate change by soaking up more carbon than forests do. Meet key species, such as bison and pumas, that could restore this resource and heal our planet.

programme.title: Baby Animals S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Family Ties - The animal kingdom can be cold and unforgiving, but for baby baboons, penguins, capybaras, and emperor tamarins, having a helpful family makes life a little easier.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Buck's Life - Follow several different males as they roam the land, climb up the social ladder, and fight for their mating rights in Eastern Grey colony. For these bucks, the drive to perpetuate their species promises a life full of risk and reward.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Castaway Island - This film travels around the island visiting some of its most striking landscapes to explore how Madagascars species have evolved over time. Madagascar is a strangely beautiful and unique world with a staggering array of habitats and special landscapes.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Madagascar in Cold Blood - Explore the lives of Madagascars cold-blooded creatures. Chameleons, frog, lizards, and snakes have all adapted in order to survive on the island. We take a look at how they find food, reproduce, and avoid predators.

programme.title: Untamed Valley S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Hippo Lagoon - Dive into Kasikizi Lagoon, where hippos go to escape the hustle and bustle of the river bends. Meet other residents of this wild sanctuary, from water scorpions to fish eagles to marabou storks hoping to steal a quick meal before the oasis dries up.

programme.title: Untamed Valley S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Big Bend - Battle the beachmaster, a giant hippo who rules a two-mile-long section of the rivers biggest bend. Watch his fellow creatures evade the Nsefu pride of lions, who are looking for an easy meal, unless a Nile crocodile decides to steal their dinner.

programme.title: Untamed Valley S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ebony Plain - Leave the river behind and stalk the valleys grasslands. Explore territory thats home to a troop of baboons, a family of warthogs, and a solitary female leopard named Olimba. Check in with a nesting family of storks and fend off wild dogs at night.

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep6
programme.desc: California - The beaches of California are some of the most beautiful in the world, but are they falling out of balance due to mankinds effects on nature? What does it take for the magnificent fauna of the Pacific Coast to keep living on the living beach?

programme.title: Rooted S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Giant - In a misty South African forest grows a six hundred year old Outeniqua Yellowwood. At forty meters tall, she towers above the canopy and is one of the few remaining of her kind. Follow her captivating story, unique as the ecosystem in her branches.

programme.title: Rooted S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Rock Splitter - The Namaqua Rock Fig Tree stands rooted on the slope of a rocky hill in Namaqualand, South Africa. It is the ultimate survivor, able to withstand the unforgiving conditions in a landscape facing ever rising temperatures and less and less rainfall each year.

programme.title: Rooted S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Hollow Heart - This is the incredible story of a tree that has been around for eight hundred years that can withstand the harshest conditions and that is more loved by insects, birds and animals than any otherthe enormous Baobab. Rooted on the savannah of Malilangwe Game Reserve in southern Zimbabwe.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Iceland: Fire - Learn about the worlds largest volcanic island, a lone and rugged place where steam escapes, water explodes, and new ground is born every day. See how fire and ice collide in a battle that makes this the most geologically powerful island on earth.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Iceland: Ice - Tour an island built by volcanoes, but sculpted by ice. About 1.5 million years ago, a sheet of ice descended from the north and covered the land. Today, massive glaciers continue to carve marine cliffs and cut down mountains.

programme.title: Shadowlands S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Bound By Blood - Experience unbelievable acts of courage and loyalty by creatures trying to survive in the remote wilderness of New Zealands South Island. Face forest penguins feast and famine cycles, and explore the tumultuous world of newborn sea lions.

programme.title: Shadowlands S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life in Dark Water - Learn how winters arrival triggers animal survival instincts in southwestern New Zealand. Track dolphins as they move to warmer waters to give their calves a fighting chance, and join longfin eels on an epic migration to their spawning grounds.

programme.title: Shadowlands S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Age of Independence - The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth S1 Ep1
programme.desc: January-February - the Year Begins - In the early months of the year, the Earths axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: March-April - a Time of Renewal - Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth S1 Ep3
programme.desc: May-June - a Time of Volatility - Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep19
programme.desc: Treasure Riders - When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep20
programme.desc: Puff Enuf - The Riders find a Puffertail and train her to join the family. She struggles to learn but soon finds herself with a chance to make a big rescue.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep25
programme.desc: The Trial of Mr. Ping - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep26
programme.desc: Baddie Issues - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep23
programme.desc: Stories - Artephius and the orphans are alone in town when a Celtic thunder god demands to be let into the treasure house or he will destroy San Lorenzo!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep24
programme.desc: Sphere - A piece of treasure that belongs to the Mole King is missing, and he won't give it up unless Puss helps him reunite with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep23
programme.desc: Lucky And The Role Reversal - After Aunt Cora moves out, Lucky tries to live a life without rules.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep24
programme.desc: Lucky And The Patchwork Plan - Lucky and her friends try to prevent Aunt Cora from leaving Miradero.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep12
programme.desc: The Party Games / Trolly Tales - Everyone gets excited because its time for the Trolls Annual funbased Party GamesPoppy and Branch try to convince the Troll kids that the library is fun.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep12
programme.desc: Pet Sitters / Narwhalicorn Day - Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize hes missing home. / Kelp feels like he cant choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep12
programme.desc: Frank and Beans with Chili / Little Hound on the Prairie - Beans is nervous that Frank is starting to make a new best friend, so Beans enlists Tag to help him win Frank back. \ Grandpaw and Grandmaw tell Tag the story of the early days of Pawston. Tags ancestor, Tagatha, built a steam-engine and turned Pawston from a one-house town into a thriving community.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep12
programme.desc: Driven to Distraction / To Bee or Not To Bee - When easily-distracted Luis is tasked with getting flowers for his grandmother's birthday party, TZG secretly keeps him on track. / When Rodney's honey bees escape from their apiary (artificial beehive), TZG secretly brings them back.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep12
programme.desc: Furious Fun - The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep12
programme.desc: Sacrifice at the Edge of Time - The kids are desperate to get back and help their fellow Panda Villagers, and Po decides he must figure out a way to defeat Jindiao before he controls the world

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep9
programme.desc: Chinese Nian Year Pt. 1 - Its Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep10
programme.desc: Chinese Nian Year Pt. 2 - Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year and hes also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nians cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but theyre no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everests magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep12
programme.desc: Curse Of The Cicadas / Beat A Fajita - The snails accidentally wake a group of cicadas from their hibernation and after the bugs begin eating the town's food supply the snails go to extreme measures to rid the city of the /A celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe and challenges the FAST crew to a relay race against his own group of copycat racing snails.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep12
programme.desc: Ottos - When a meteor crashes into the Wrenchtools' home, the Dinotrux take them to safe ground; little do they know D-Structs is planning a giant attack.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep12
programme.desc: Venice the Menace - The Wanderers head to Venice to get a new cookie jar from Venice. Odlulu aims to become belle of the ball at the Venice Carnival but when she gets hold of the Crystal Glass Key, she turns the canals of Venice to glass. The Wanderers must get the key back and restore the city to normal.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep12
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Reckless Rollers - Pat is delivering some new car wash rollers to Ted, but the locks on his van doors are faulty. As Pat negotiates an obstruction in the road, the van doors fly open and the rollers fly into a field of startled sheep! Integrating them into their flock, the sheep make off with them, and Pat and Jess take chase, creating more chaos on the roads. Meanwhile, PC Selby has arrived at the car wash, eager to get the panda car cleaned for his date with Dr Gilbertson. Unable to help, Ted engages him in conversation about roadblocks - and PC Selby begins erecting them all over the garage forecourt! Having finally retrieved his Special Delivery, Pat calls PC Selby, who immediately packs up his roadblocks and takes them where they're needed. After a little interruption from the cheeky sheep, the roads are safe and PC Selby escorts Pat back to the carwash. Pat and PC Selby help Ted fit his new rollers and Pat becomes his first car wash customer!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep12
programme.desc: Hurry Up Raa Raa - Raa Raa has agreed to do too many things with too many people today. Will he be able to do them and keep all his friends happy? More importantly, will it make him happy?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep12
programme.desc: The Case Of The Dazzle Dragon - Everyone in Fable Fields is very worried that a new Dazzle Dragon has appeared in the land. Big Ears says there's no such thing as a Dragon in Toyland so Noddy decides to investigate. All the evidence seems to lead to a dragon footprints, loud noises and glimpses of shiny scales in the woods but clever Noddy thinks it through and, using his investigating skills of looking and looking again, soon realises that the dragon' isn't a dragon at all! It's the knights out on patrol in their shiny armour and tight formation! Phew! Thanks Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep64
programme.desc: Shrinking Pip - The Tots are all measuring themselves. Pip hasn't grown much since he was last measured. How can he grow into a big strong gooseberry?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep13
programme.desc: Sea Monsters / Puff Fruit - Rumors of scary sea monsters in the East End take the kids on a journey of discovering you shouldnt believe everything you hear. / Mysterious globs disturbing the ocean turn out to be the byproduct of food from Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep13
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 1 - While the others care for baby dragons at the roost, Dak, Winger, Burple and Aggro come face-to-face with a grumpy old dragon on a dangerous island.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peet's Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep5
programme.desc: Return Of The Uncle King - Set on reclaiming his throne, Uncle King Julien convinces Julien to go into Foosa territory. Julien creates a disguise and forces Maurice to join him.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep6
programme.desc: Eat Pray Shove - Clover is forced to take a vacation, and while she's away, she meets the handsome and free-spirited Sage Moondancer.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky And The Appaloosa Adventure - Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep6
programme.desc: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise - Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep3
programme.desc: Sewer Koi and the Museum Heist - An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced theyre the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but hes missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewers water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! Its going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before its too late.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.desc: Monster Machine - The annual baby pageant approaches, but Stacis plan to win may have a negative effect

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep27

The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. But the obscure ingredients are hard to find, so they have to team up and go on an adventure.

Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Mortys five babies.
