programme.desc: Working Like a Sharkdog - All Sharkdog wants to do is play with his new toy, but when Dad ends up on a wild adventure through town, Sharkdog must give up his playtime and come to Dad's rescue.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Sharkdog's Got Talent - Sharkdog wants to perform in the talent show with Max, but all Max wants to do is chill. Will Sharkdog perform with one of Max's friends instead?

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Meteor Madness - The Sharkpack are excited to watch the meteor shower on Foggy Springs's highest mountain, and Sharkdog knows the best way to get there. The only problem? Captain Quigley thinks she does too.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Celery & Hummus / Lettuce Wraps - Chef, Olly, Ruby and Henry compete in the annual Celeryjack Games. But Chef, who's used to winning, faces stiff competition this year.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Making Bread / From One Pit to Another - Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Tenderest Bond of All / The Orange Empire - While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese souffl.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper - Paddington leads a treasure hunt to find captain Green Beard's loot, but will they all remain friends and share?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Sir Blaze and the Unicorn - Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Pups Save an Extreme Lunch / Pups Save a Cat Burglar - Daring Danny X is performing a new stunt! He is harnessed over a canyon eating an Extreme Lunch when the wind blows him upside down!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Pups Save the Butterflies / Pups Save an Underground Chicken - Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Masked Fishy / The Best Friends Game - When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Child Of The Stars I / Child Of The Stars II - Barbapapa and Lolita spotted a flying saucer approaching their house. // The Barbapapa have taken off aboard Bababam in the hope of discovering the planet of Baby Big Feet.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Paddington's Puffling Rescue / Paddington Goes Under The Sea - Paddington and the Browns rescue pufflings who, instead of taking their firs flight, get lost around the campsite.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep120
programme.desc: The Crew and Chase Are On The Case - There's a mystery afoot in Builder Cove! When the sculpture of all the townsfolk suddenly disappears, Chase joins Rubble & Crew to solve the case of the missing statue

programme.title: DORA S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Adventures In Plantsitting / Andrea the Alebrije - Dora and Boots take care of baby flowers Bouncy Blue, Dizzy Daisy, and Baby Rosette so Isa can attend a royal tea party.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Abra-Ka-Pickle! - Pickle is putting on a magic show for all of Axle City! But when Crusher accidentally makes a magical mistake, it's up to Blaze and Pickle to fix the magic and save their friends! Abra-ka-Pickle!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Noodle Bowls / Spicy Cauliflower Bites - Chef wants to host dinner and a show, but struggles when he can't seem to get any of his magic tricks right.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Big Picture - Sharkdog is very excited to be in the annual Fisher family photo, but disaster after disaster threatens his perfect picture.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Air Sharkdog - When Dennis challenges the Sharkpack to a game of 3-on-3 basketball, Sharkdog reveals he's an amazing player. So amazing, he may end up taking Max's spot!

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Sick as a Sharkdog - When Sharkdog comes down with a mysterious cold, Max knows Dad will be able to help him feel better. But things go haywire when the aquarium's robot doctor takes over the examination!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Masked Fishy / The Best Friends Game - When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Tell-Tale Scooter - Baby Shark accidentally breaks William's new scooter and hides the evidence.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Pups Save an Elephant Family / Pups and the Mischievous Kittens - The pups' road trip through the savanna becomes a mission to reunite and rescue an elephant family!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep808
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treetop Trekkers - Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Smoothie Shop / The Crew Builds A Dino Roof Party - Caf Carl opens up a smoothie shop on the boardwalk! But when the coaster causes coconut chaos, Rubble & Crew know just what to do.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep248
programme.desc: Bouncy Ball - Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Circus - Bubu's DVD of his favorite circus show does not work. The others create their own circus acts in the backyard. Doing acrobatics, juggling, and magic!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Friendship Journal - Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal."

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Nopales Tacos / Sloppy Joes - Accepting a knightly quest, Sir Chef sets out to turn a prickly pear cactus into nopales. // When Chef is gifted a brand new apron, he vows to keep it clean.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Donuts - Chef attempts to bake Olly's favorite donuts for her surprise birthday breakfast without waking her up.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Runaway Rocket - When Crusher tries to cheat at a carnival game, he accidentally strands himself and Pickle on a giant rocket!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Musical! - In the first ever Blaze Musical, Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle are on a daring quest to find the pieces of the Broken Key and unlock a secret treasure

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep923
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends / Pups Save a Puffy Mayor - The Paw Patrol must rescue Mr. Porter and reunite an ostrich family before the big birds get into big trouble.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep924
programme.desc: Pups Save a Jukebox / Pups Save a Mayor on a Wire - Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox so he can play an annoying song all day long. Chase and Rubble track it down to save the records.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep326
programme.desc: Pups Save Floating Friends - The aliens spaceship is on the fritz and shooting out anti-gravity rays. Ryder and the pups need to repair the spaceship.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Dam / The Crew Builds A Squirrel-Proof Farm - Rubble & Crew are on the job to save Builder Cove after a rainstorm threatens to flood the town.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep65
programme.desc: Honk Honk - The Teletubbies hear a 'honk honk' in the distance and the Tubby Car approaches. The Tubby Car drives the Teletubbies across Teletubbyland as they sing the Tubby Car song.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep23
programme.desc: W - Dee encourages a friend to say 'w', and they go on an adventure around the sound. They play in some water, see a worm and wear some wigs!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Top of the Mountain - The friends go on a mountain hiking competition.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep46
programme.desc: Eye Spy - Messy and friends explore the forest with Tweedy. When her eyesight fails, Zim, Zam and Zoom lend a hand.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep35
programme.desc: Smoochy Kiss - Bluey and Bingo want Dad all to themselves and will not let Mum have a smoochy kiss. They try to hide him all around the house, but Mum is desperate to spend a little romance time with her husband.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep34
programme.desc: Space - Mackenzie, Jack and Rusty are playing as astronauts on a mission to Mars, but during their journey, Mackenzie keeps going missing and no one knows why, not even Mackenzie.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep4
programme.desc: The Talent Badge - Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep3
programme.desc: The Transport Badge - When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep39
programme.desc: Funky Fireflies, Selangor River, Malaysia - A trip to see fireflies becomes a rescue when Xuli and Glitch get stuck in a swamp.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep40
programme.desc: Pirate Peril, Jamaica - Xuli dives into action when Glitch's pirate game puts Lars in danger. Yo-ho Go Jetters go!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep39
programme.desc: The Sleepover - A sleepover with their cousin means Bluey and Bingo get to stay up late! But when Muffin shows up exhausted after missing her nap, the girls get more fun than they bargained for.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Copycat - Bluey's having fun copying everything Dad says and does, but the game takes a serious turn when Bluey finds a hurt budgie and they have to make an emergency trip to the vet.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Drinking - Andy Day knows young animals need to find a drink. An elephant calf has to learn to drink with a trunk, and ostrich chicks follow mum and dad to find water in the desert.

programme.title: Andy's Dino Toybox S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Dinosaur Tails - Ankylosaurus is tired from carrying around his heavy armour and tail all day, the last thing he needs is to get something stuck on it.

programme.title: Dog Squad S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Mission: Party Time - Disability assistance dog Tinks is determined to help her owner Charli feel confident enough to go to a party.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Indian Peafowl and Gorilla - This episode features the Indian peafowl and the gorilla - their wild connection is they are dimorphic, meaning the male and female have a different appearance.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep13
programme.desc: Midnight Feast - The pirates would love to have a midnight feast even though Captain Captain forbids it. It states in her pirate handbook that a pirates bedtime is 8 o'clock, so a midnight feast is not an option.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep17
programme.desc: The Camping Badge - Duggee and the squirrels are going camping and they hear a scary noise outside the tent!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep16
programme.desc: The Medicine Badge - Duggee's not very well, he's lost his voice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep15
programme.desc: The Pizza Badge - The Squirrels help Duggee try out his new outdoor pizza oven.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Mariana Trench: The Pacific Ocean - With the help of his hero Ron Allum, Lars plans to dive to the bottom of the Mariana Trench in a submersible called the Deep Sea Challenger.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Go Jetter or No Jetter? - Foz starts to think his team doesn't need him anymore. Can Tala convince him he still has what it takes to be a Go Jetter, or will he follow Glitch down a different path?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep6
programme.desc: Shankar's Makeover - There's a fancy dress competition on the railways and while Thomas and the others are excited, Shankar doesn't want to join in.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep38
programme.desc: Cinema Scoot - Sarah and Duck join Scooter Boy at the cinema to watch his favourite film.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep37
programme.desc: Haber Dasher - When the zip on Sarah's hoodie breaks, Scarf Lady suggests a trip to the haberdasher.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Bubbles - Stanley cleans Cynthia's bus, but each time he does it keeps getting dirty again. It's so dirty by the end, he invents a super-duper cleaning machine that makes a sea of bubbles.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep2
programme.desc: House - Myrtle's aunt Cressy is coming to stay, and she needs Stanley to make her a bed for her. This escalates into Stanley building her a whole set of rooms outside Myrtles actual house.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Wild Thing - Monty and Jimmy Jones think it would be exciting to have a pet lion and wonder why you can't keep wild animals at home.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep27
programme.desc: It's Time to Look for Signs - On the way home from Jared's shop with Gran Gran, JoJo finds out about the signs around them and what they mean. They are everywhere, and they all have a job to do.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Driving - With only five minutes to play 'Driving', Bluey and Mum race against the clock to buy milk for a grumpy guest and have to escape an angry shopkeeper.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep21
programme.desc: Tina - Tired of being told what to do, Bluey and Bingo enlist their giant invisible friend Tina to show Mum and Dad who's boss. Now they can do anything they want, until Mum and Dad rebel.

programme.desc: Whale Watching - Bluey promises her customer, Bingo, the best tour ever in a game of Whale Watching, but they need Mum and Dad to join in, and they are too tired to play after a late night.

programme.desc: The Island Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels are out doing a bit of sailing. What fun!

programme.desc: The Transport Badge - When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep39
programme.desc: Funky Fireflies, Selangor River, Malaysia - A trip to see fireflies becomes a rescue when Xuli and Glitch get stuck in a swamp.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep40
programme.desc: Pirate Peril, Jamaica - Xuli dives into action when Glitch's pirate game puts Lars in danger. Yo-ho Go Jetters go!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep39
programme.desc: The Sleepover - A sleepover with their cousin means Bluey and Bingo get to stay up late! But when Muffin shows up exhausted after missing her nap, the girls get more fun than they bargained for.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Copycat - Bluey's having fun copying everything Dad says and does, but the game takes a serious turn when Bluey finds a hurt budgie and they have to make an emergency trip to the vet.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Drinking - Andy Day knows young animals need to find a drink. An elephant calf has to learn to drink with a trunk, and ostrich chicks follow mum and dad to find water in the desert.

programme.title: Andy's Dino Toybox S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Dinosaur Tails - Ankylosaurus is tired from carrying around his heavy armour and tail all day, the last thing he needs is to get something stuck on it.

programme.title: Dog Squad S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Mission: Party Time - Disability assistance dog Tinks is determined to help her owner Charli feel confident enough to go to a party.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Indian Peafowl and Gorilla - This episode features the Indian peafowl and the gorilla - their wild connection is they are dimorphic, meaning the male and female have a different appearance.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep13
programme.desc: Midnight Feast - The pirates would love to have a midnight feast even though Captain Captain forbids it. It states in her pirate handbook that a pirates bedtime is 8 o'clock, so a midnight feast is not an option.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: REV
programme.desc: 2025 Dakar-winner Timo Gottschalk on the life of a co-driver - German co-driver Timo Gottschalk has won the Dakar Rally twice. First in 2011, alongside Nasser Al-Attiyah, and more recently in 2025, with Saudi Arabian driver Yazeed Al-Rajhi. Of his 17 starts at the event, Gottschalk has only two wins to show for them. As he says though, winning the Dakar isnt easy, and requires luck. And total commitment to the art of co-driving.

programme.title: Transforming Business
programme.desc: The race for deep sea dominance - In the race for green technology, the deep ocean is the new battleground. The ocean floor holds more of the rare earth metals we need for the energy transition than all known land deposits, a treasure trove once thought impossible to mine. But now, with the introduction of breakthrough technologies, companies from China, Canada, Norway to Russia, and beyond are competing for dominance.

programme.title: UFC 314: Volkanovski vs. Lopes

Plus, its one of the most highly anticipated bouts of 2025 when British star Paddy Pimblett meets up with Iron Michael Chandler in a five-round co- main event showdown, and international sensation Patricio Pitbull battles former interim featherweight king Yair Rodriguez.
